headline: Paperback Row
abstract: Six new paperbacks to check out this week.
lead_paragraph: WORKING, by Robert A. Caro. (Vintage, $16.) In these brief personal pieces, Caro excavates his experiences creating his monumental biographies of Robert Moses and Lyndon Johnson. Our reviewer, Harold Evans, called these reminiscences “iridescent, so many brilliant refractions of light from his hard slog of discovering what life has really meant for the people in his narratives, the powerful and the powerless.”
